author: The Spiffing Brit
description:
Stellaris is back! But what happens when you play by breaking all of the normal rules of the game! You see I love to break games but what happens when you break a game so much by exploiting bugs and glitches that the entire thing crawls to a hault as it cannot process what you have done! Well thats what we are here to find out today! Is Stellaris a perfectly balanced game with no exploits in 2025 or does my quest for infinite money endless riches and ai technologies that break science mean that this game might have a few unintended bugs. 

This entire video was recorded on stellaris 4.0 a big free update to the game. In particular this version is 4.0.4 which if you want to try this exploit yourself you can do by rolling your game back to it using steam betas. But what is stellaris. Steam says it lets you Explore a galaxy full of wonders in this sci-fi grand strategy game from Paradox Development Studios. Interact with diverse alien races, discover strange new worlds with unexpected ev
title: What Happens If You Break Every Rule in Stellaris?
